partnership.textBeforeImg:
Until now, the problem of health insurance is acute all over the world. It would seem that the primary service that guarantees the normal existence of man and is a luxury for most citizens even of the most advanced economiсs of the world.

Among the most pressing problems of this industry is:

  • Non-rising insurance prices
  • Many thousands of queues in state programs
  • Only partial coverage of insurance costs for medical service in serious cases
  • Fraud by private insurance companies
  • Delays in payments for insurance

The problems of health insurance couse the inaccessibility or self-denial of a person from receiving the necessary treatment. And if the consequences of such situations do not make themselves felt at once, then they are totaly manifested in the future.

In our Insurance points program, we use the model of obtaining timely medical care for system Points tied to the MPT token. Regular replenishment of the account balance and growth of the token will allow each participant to receive more medical services over time in the same amount of Points.
partnership.textAfterImg: Cooperation with the MedPoints™ system encourages the provision of professional medical services at a high level, which ultimately affects not only the profits of each particular market participant, but also the well-being of society.

Welcome to MedPoints™! This is a basic demo that simulates user experience, but does not contain the full functionality at the moment.
If you want to become part of the project and support its development, please join our IEO company.

foundation.points: Points from General fund serve for partial coverage in cases when required amount for the full treatment remains less then 10%, but the company's time has passed.
foundation.foundationText1:
One of the most significant aspects of the MedPoints™ system, we believe, is the functionality of a decentralized collection of funds to help seriously ill or needy people.

Cases requiring the collection of funds for treatment and / or emergency care can be added only by representatives of clinics and medical institutions.

Even if the necessary amount has not been achieved, all collected funds are sent to the account of the medical institution for the treatment of this particular case and the patient.

The MedPoints™ system does not take a percentage of the fundraising, except standard payment required to conduct transactions within the system.
foundation.foundationText2:
The fact that all transactions are carried out through a decentralized platform, ensures that all collected money will go to the decision of a specific case and will not go to the hands of third parties or scammers.

A separate point of medical care within the MedPoints™ project is a General fund not tied to a specific fund-raising case, where anyone can make a contribution in any amount and any time. Points from General fund serve for partial coverage in cases when required amount for the full treatment remains less then 10%, but the company's time has passed.

about.title: What is MedPoints™ system?
about.description:
MedPoints™ is a decentralized ecosystem that allows its members to receive highly qualified medical services all around the world.

The most advanced clinics and medical specialists have already appreciated all the advantages of using our online tool, that why they provide a special price offer and discounts to all participants of our system.
about.bestClinics:
Best clinics

We cooperate with clinics, in which highly qualified specialists work.
about.provenDoctors:
Proven Doctors

On our site are posted questionnaires, the best and most importantly, proven doctors.
about.specialPrices:
Special prices

All participants of the MedPoints system receive special price offers from medical institutions.
about.genuineReviews:
Only genuine reviews

Our site contains only genuine reviews, patients visited doctors.

friendly.title: Friendly for patients
friendly.description: MedPoints™ for patients is a source of information about doctors and medical services worldwide with honest rankings and live feedback, a mobile app enabling them to arrange an appointment with any specialist in just 3 clicks.

functional.title: Functional for medics
functional.description: MedPoints™ for medical institutions is a source of new, loyal customers. It is a convenient and easy-to-use software that combines the features of the reception and file records of patients.

possibilities.title: Key features of the system
possibilities.description:
Search

The primary task that we are trying to solve is choosing the best medical institution. To do this, we have designed a multi-tier search mechanism by several variables in our system. Any participant can find a specialist, an institution or a service corresponding to his or her specific request.

We offer several dimensions of search for the required specialist:

  • Search by geolocation (for clients looking for clinics nearby)
  • Search by field (for clients choosing the best price-quality ratio)
  • Search by name of the institution or the doctor (an intuitive search through the entire database of specialists; such clients usually come upon the recommendation or want to check someone's reputation)
  • Search by the list of services provided
  • Search by formulary
  • Search by symptoms (under development)

Filtration parameters are available in each section of the website for more accurate delivery of results.


Rating

Rating is the second important factor in a clinic selection, so we stick to several rules in its compilation.

Rating of a medical institution, a doctor or a pharmacy is formed on the basis of rates given by a patient in his or her review. The user can add reviews to the system only after the execution of the smart contract for booking. It rules out the possibility of adding fake reviews.

We made adding a review of the visit and the quality of service of a particular specialist or a clinic mandatory for a patient after each visit in order to increase the rating relevance.

Overall rating of a doctor is divided into 4 components:

  • Specialist's knowledge
  • Practical skills
  • Care about the patient
  • Value for money.

Rating of the institution is formed based on:

  • Accessibility
  • Quality of service
  • Cleanliness
  • Value for money.

Pharmacy rating is formed based on:

  • Quality of service
  • Value for money.

The rating system generates healthy competition and encourages specialists and institutions to fight for the loyalty of each patient. This results in a higher quality of services provided.

A decentralized user community guarantees honest feedback. As a result, institutions benefit from providing highly qualified services with personal respect to the patient.

In order to rule out institutions with a dubious reputation, we use a mechanism that excludes a clinic or a pharmacological business from the network if its rating falls below the threshold value. If a clinic or a pharmacy is excluded, it will not be able to apply for a partnership within 1 year. This mechanism will serve as another incentive for medical institutions to provide only high-quality services and customer treatment. After one year, the excluded medical institution may reapply for participation in the system. This term is set because this time is often enough for a complete replacement of the institution’s personnel, and the new team can declare themselves with a fresh start.

Any action of the medical employee can affect the rating of the entire institution in the future, which generally encourages the system participants to reach a new level of the quality of services and thereby reduce the risk of fatal errors due to negligence.

Medical institutions participating in insurance programs and fundraising programs for needy people get extra points to their rating. This scheme is introduced with a view to attracting as many partners as possible to the active financial model of settlements for the provision of medical services within the system.


Booking

Once the user has made a decision about the clinic and/or the doctor, he or she can:

  • Select a convenient date from the specific specialist’s schedule and make an appointment
  • Reserve money for the provision of service/services
  • Once the booking and appointment time are confirmed by the clinic, the system forms a smart contract for the provision of services and generates a record in the personal calendar in the user's Personal Account
  • After the services were provided, the patient can confirm the transfer of MedPoints™ points to the clinic account via a mobile app or website right in the clinic.

If necessary, the medical institution can additionally request access to medical records of the patient. It is up to the patient to decide which records to disclose.

We are going to encourage payments with MPT points by providing a flexible bonus system, including discounts for repeated visits to a particular institution and special price offers from the partners of the system.


Payment system

The problem of availability of convenient and reliable payment tools is particularly acute in regard to transnational settlements. Inflation, correlation of exchange rates and domestic regulators aggravate the problem.

Bitcoin and blockchain have already proved that they can help solve this problem. So far, there are 1,500+ digital currencies, each having advantages and drawbacks.

MedPoints™ has its own payment unit – an MPT point equal to the cognominal token.

Specifics of MPT:

  • No fixed fee; the fee is calculated automatically depending on the amount of data transmitted
  • High transaction speed secured by so-called 'ranges' – services are paid only after the smart contract execution, which, in turn, may include several sessions of balance refill and payments for the clinic’s services.

Each component of the network, including the website, app and software for medical institutions, has built-in wallets that display not only the user balance, but also the entire history of transactions in real time.


Digitization of medical records

The MedPoints™ system allows patients to digitize and keep medical records in any format.

Data encryption at all stages guarantees that only the records owner has full access to them, which is an indispensable condition for ensuring privacy and security of documents stored.

Each record is part of a distributed ledger and cannot be altered or tampered with.

Various medical organizations can request access to the patient's medical chart. The patient can allow to access either the entire medical chart or a limited number of records. Coupled with the ability to set the time access limits for specific organizations, this tool provides each patient a wide range of functions for managing his or her digitized medical records.

The system automatically converts the uploaded files in png and jpg/jpeg formats. Converted images weigh a lot less than the source images, which positively affects the cost of digitizing and encourages patients to upload as much data from their medical records as possible.

beneficial.title: Beneficial for investors
beneficial.description: MedPoints™ for investors is the MPT token secured by live money received from both new members and regular users. Any member of the platform with a balance above the threshold can become an Investor and earn an interest from each transaction in the system.

faq.thanks: Thank you for asking a question. Our managers will contact you shortly
faq.name: Your name
faq.projectQuestions:
What is MedPoints™?

MedPoints™ is a decentralized service for finding doctors and recording for an appointment to them. We help our visitors to choose a good specialist in the best location for them.

Is MedPoints™ a clinic?

No, MedPoints™ is a service where you can find and make an appointment in a suitable clinic. MedPoints™ does not provide medical services.

Can I make an appointment to any doctor?

If this specialist is already added by the partner clinic, then yes, you can. Every day the database of the service is replenished with new members.

MedPoints™ is free for patients?

MedPoints™ is a blockchain platform, to maintain the functionality of which requires charging a commission for a number of actions on the site. These expenses on the part of the patient are compensated by special price offers from the partners of the system.

How much does it cost to make an appointment to a doctor through MedPoints™?

The cost of appointment to a doctor depends on the clinic in which he works. For our part, we guarantee that we do not overestimate the cost of services and that prices correspond to the official price from the clinics.

Can I add my child?

Yes, you can add data of your child, but when you visit a doctor, you must have all the necessary and accompanying documents to prove that you are his parent or official guardian.
faq.storingQuestions:
How is personal information stored?

Your personal data of health history and transactions are stored in a distributed form, not on your phone or any software. institutions. Nobody except you can read or change your data.

How can I access my account?

In the registration process on the platform you will be generated 2 keys, with which you can access your account. Keep this information confidential and do not share it with anyone. Decentralization does not imply the restoration of access by means of requests to support, becouse no one, include developers, have no access to this data.

How long have you kept the patient data?

Your information is stored as long as you have an active account in the system. When you delete your account, all your personal information will also be deleted and will no longer be available after generating a new block in the chain.

Are my records available to a third party?

MedPoints™ can not and will not share your data with anyone unless you personaly not to open access to your records by request of medical specialists.
faq.bookingQuestions:
How to choose a doctor on MedPoints™?

We provide several search options for professionals and detailed questionnaires with honest ratings and reviews. You will be able to choose a doctor that suits your criteria. You can sort the list by experience and cost of visit. You also can sort experts by who visit patient at home and/or work with childrens.

How is the doctor's appointment paid?

Reception of the doctor is paid in the context of a smart contract for the provision of services by the clinic. May not include the additional services that will be required during visiting clinic.

How can I leave a review?

A feedback system is mandatory for each patient. It can be a couple of words or just a plus sign. It is important for us that every specialist and clinic had as many reviews as possible to create the most accurate assessment of the services provided by them.

How quickly does the confirmation come from the clinic?

The processing speed of the application is influenced by several factors:
  • The traffic in the blockchain network
  • Number of active operators on the side of the clinic
  • Time of appointment (working hours of medical institutions may not coincide with your time zone)
The combination of these factors affects the speed of booking confirmation, and can take from 5 minutes to 24 hours.

How to add a complaint with the clinic?

We do not handle complaints privately, but you can leave feedback with an appropriate assessment and if the clinic's rating falls below the red line it will be automatically excluded from the database for 1 year.
faq.partnershipQuestions:
How can I add a doctor?

To register in the system as a doctor or any other medical employee you need to be among the staff of one of the clinics that are part of the system, because only clinics can add medical personal and services.

How to register clinics and / or medical centers?

Any clinic, regardless of geography, can become part of the MedPoints™ system, all that required is to download the software for a specific operating system to the clinic's computer, go through verification and add information about itself, a list of departments, doctors and offered services. The addition process involves importing data from the xml table.

Does the clinic need an account?

When you activate the software on your computer, a wallet will be automatically created for you, which will be used to pay for the services of the clinic. You do not need to replenish the balance additionally.

What documents are needed to open an account of the clinic?

To gain access to the MedPoints™ customer base and add information about your employees and services to the database medical institution needs:
  1. Read and agree to the terms of conditions on the site
  2. Goes through verification
  3. After that, the official mail of the clinic will receive a link to download the licensed software for processing applications

How much does the service cost?

All partners 'pay' with resources of their computers, becouse it is on their side all transactions are processed. Additional investments from clinics, pharmacological businesses and their representative offices are not required.

How to pay taxes?

Each clinic independently conducts its own tax accounting in accordance with the current legislation of the host country. MedPoints™ in this case is only a communication channel between the doctor and the patient.

Are you blocking accounts? How can this be avoided?

The account can be blocked only in one case - if the clinic's rating fell below the red line. Re-registration for this medical institution will be available only after 1 year.

Why are deleted accounts available again after 1 year?

Medical market is a dynamic sphere of activity and for a period of 12 months not only the management but also the staff of the institution can change, which entitles new participants to show themselves best in the MedPoints™ system.

How clinics and pharmacies withdraw money?

For each account of the clinic, it is possible to withdraw the accumulated MPT points to its official requisites. Payments take from 1 to 5 days depending on the legal address.
faq.prescriptionsQuestions:
Can I get a real prescription?

Within the framework of existing agreements and the current legislation on the traffic of drugs, we can not provide 100% of the functionality to obtain valid prescriptions in all pharmacies. However, as the network expands, the number of interacting medical institutions will grow, and accordingly you will be able to use your virtual prescription in more pharmacological networks.

Are the prescriptions confidential?

Information on your prescription is available to you, the specialist who prescribe it and medical institution in which he works. No one else has access to information on your prescriptions.

What prescriptions can the doctor prescribe?

Within the limits of digital prescriptions the doctor has the right to write out to you the prescription for any medicinal preparations, except for a group of strong, narcotic substances and experimental preparations.
* The traffic of all drugs is regulated by the current legislation of the host country.
* We provide the opportunity to receive electronic prescriptions only for patients aged 18 years.
faq.generalQuestions:
How can I pay for services?

We accept all major credit cards and PayPal transfers to fill the balance of your account in the system.

Can I use the system for emergencies?

In MedPoints™, we tried to create an ecosystem with the most-rapid processing of requests for medical specialists, however, there are several variables in this connection channel that are not directly related to the platform, so if you think that your problem is urgent medical assistance, we advise you to seek the help in emergency medical services and if it's possible to call an ambulance.

Which doctors work in the system?

All doctors whose profiles are available in the MedPoints™ system are certified medical specialists with an official place of work in one of the partners clinics.

How can I communicate with a doctor in another language?

At the moment the system works in several languages. As for direct live communication, the platform does not provide for the services of translators. At least for now.

chooseDoctor.title: Additional actions required
chooseDoctor.text:
In order to create a new record you need to book a visit to a doctor. To do it, follow the following steps:

  • Go to the "Services" section of this site.
  • Find a service you want to get and click the "doctors" button.
  • Press the "Book to visit" button.
  • Enter the required data in the form and book a visit.

rates.subtitle: Exchange other currency to MPT on your balance

insurance.textBeforeImg:
How does the Insurance points program work in the MedPoints™ system?

The system of insurance Points in the MedPoints™ network is a protocol through which, as a result of regular user contributions, formed his insurance fund, which the patient can spend on services marked in smart contract with medical institution.

The list of specific cases, services and places of their provision is formed individually {{localize req 'ratings.basedOn'}} agreements with the medical institutions, their territorial and legal representation.

A user with a balance is sufficient to connect the Insurance points program. Patient itself chooses which insurance cases will be included in the smart-contract.

Services for an insurance case are provided by medical institutions participating in the Insurance points program according to the rules of MedPoints™ platform.

The order and amount of contributions are also prescribed in a smart-contract and depend on the number of insurance cases chosen by the patient.

A smart-contract for the provision of medical insurance services is valid until the moment of an insured event or termination of contributions.

Benefits for patients:
  • Guarantees the receipt of qualified medical assistance from the funds accumulated within the framework of the insurance program
  • Gives the possibility to receive medical services in any clinics all over the world
  • Provides special prices from medical institutions
  • Raises personal responsibility for the state of their health, and creates conditions for interest in maintaining and strengthening health

Voluntary medical insurance within the framework of the program MedPoints™ allows all its participants to exchange MPT accumulation Points for medical services of institutions around the world

The system encourages the participants of the Insurance points program for the regular replenishment of the fund by the accrual of additional Points

Advantages for medical institutions:
  • Guarantees the provider of medical care payment from insured citizens
  • Establish economic interest in the results of their work
Advantages for all
  • The amount of insurance contributions is of a contractual nature and is established by agreement of the parties
  • Decentralization of the Insurance points program excludes all possible risks associated with the involvement of a third party in the channel 'Doctor - Patient'. All interactions between medical institutions are governed by the general rules of the system and rigidly fixed in a smart-contract
  • Insurance points program serves for demonopolization of the public health system with all its attendant shortcomings
  • Ensuring participation in the system of medical insurance for health care providers regardless of the form of their property

Some of the patient services (not noticed in the smart-contract) are not covered by the MedPoints ™ insurance program.

These services include:

  • Self-initiated surveys
  • Anonymous diagnostic and prophylactic measures
  • Home-based procedures
  • Preventive vaccinations at the request of citizens
  • Spa treatment
  • Cosmetology services
  • Dental prosthetics
  • Training in the care of patients
  • Additional services

The MedPoints insurance program is confirmed by direct agreements with representatives of the medical institutions and regulated within the rules of the system, as well as the current legislation of the host country.

blogs.title: Launching the Blockchain explorer
blogs.shortText: In order to display the transactions in the test network, we created a Blockchain explorer that operates in real time.
blogs.text:
In order to display the transactions in the test network, we created a Blockchain explorer that operates in real time.

After passing the simple registration and testing of the recording system to a medical specialist through a smart-contract, you can immediately see your transaction in the block.

Development of a blockchain-explorer was made for tracking transaction activity and demonstrating the functionality of the entire set of modules in a single complex.

blogs.title: Running the demo version of blockchain
blogs.shortText: Today, we have the minimum necessary functionality of our own blockchain that allows you to make an appointment with a specialist in a <nobr>smart-contract</nobr> format.
blogs.text:
Today, we have the minimum necessary functionality of our own blockchain that allows you to make an appointment with a specialist in a smart-contract format.

At this stage, the functionality of the system eliminates the use of software on the side of organizations, therefore, all transactions take place without payment and in demo mode.

Information that not connected with the booking directly is still stored in a local database, but in the future this functionality will also be rebuilt for a distributed registry.

blogs.title: End of development of the MVP <nobr>back-end</nobr>
blogs.shortText: To show the performance of the idea to book to medical specialist through a <nobr>smart-contract</nobr>, we created a demo system with enough functionality to test our own blockchain.
blogs.text:
To show the performance of the idea to book to medical specialist through a smart-contract, we created a demo system with enough functionality to test our own blockchain.
Back-end design includes:
  1. 1. Programming of architectural and service layers of the block
    During this stage, the base architecture of the blockchain layer will be created. The layers of work with the database, network communications are connected and blocks are added.
  2. 2. Programming business logic and implementing a user’s client
    During this stage, the integration of the REST-service and the blockchain-layer will be carried out. Work will begin on creating the client and integrating it with the REST-service.
  3. 3. Importing demo data
    Collection of information and development of modules for importing demo data. Connecting filters to the frontend catalog.
    4. If you have any questions or suggestions about the system, please feel free to write to us in the official channels of the project.

blogs.title: Finishing of the project front
blogs.shortText: Today we completed the development of the user part of the project. We tried to make it both simple and functional. We paid special attention to the possibility of changing the font size on the pages of the site, which will allow people with problematic vision to work with the system without difficulty.
blogs.text:
Today we completed the development of the user part of the project. We tried to make it both simple and functional. We paid special attention to the possibility of changing the font size on the pages of the site, which will allow people with problematic vision to work with the system without difficulty.
Front design includes:
  1. 1. Research
    At this stage, a theoretical study was conducted and the choice of the tools, technologies and libraries used. The initial design of the solution was carried out.
  2. 2. Design of the REST-services architecture
    The database is connected.
    Added basic dependencies to the project.
    The basic infrastructure is set up.
    The database for the block-part of the project has been selected.
  3. 3. Creating a user’s online client template
    The model and logic of user interaction with the system was developed, the online client front-end template was created.
    If you have any questions or suggestions about the system, please feel free to write to us in the official channels of the project.

blogs.title: Making cosmetic improvements to the site
blogs.shortText: After a long pause associated with the fall of the cryptocurrency market, our team returned to active work in the project. During the time when each of us was engaged in parallel projects, we managed to take a break (in a good way) from MedPoints and look at many aspects of the system in a new way.
blogs.text:
After a long pause associated with the fall of the cryptocurrency market, our team returned to active work in the project. During the time when each of us was engaged in parallel projects, we managed to take a break (in a good way) from MedPoints and look at many aspects of the system in a new way.

We have identified some minor bugs in the system and improved usability of the site. We also worked on the localization of the platform and fixed some moments in the user’s part.

The current “Bull Run” in the cryptocurrency market today allows us to spend more time working on a project that we consider the whole team to be one of the most significant in our career. We hope that you will find it interesting and you will support us at the stage of development and development of the system.

blogs.shortText: Search functionality is the primary tool to find the best medical solution. We designed a multi-tier search mechanism by several variables in our system. Any participant can find a specialist, an institution or a service corresponding to his or her specific request.

blogs.title: Technical implementation of registration and authorization
blogs.shortText: When you open the registration page, a request is made to the blockchain, which generates a new Wallet ID and Wallet key. Next, the user fills necessary fields and clicks on the registration button. At the same time, the system writes the new user to the database, assigning him the identifier obtained after generating the hash...

blogs.title: Booking in MedPoints™ system
blogs.shortText: We are going to encourage payments with MPT points by providing a flexible bonus system, including discounts for repeated visits to a particular institution and special price offers from the partners of the system.

If necessary, the medical institution can additionally request access to medical records of the patient. It is up to the patient to decide which records to disclose.
We are going to encourage payments with MPT points by providing a flexible bonus system, including discounts for repeated visits to a particular institution and special price offers from the partners of the system.

blogs.title: Digitization of medical records
blogs.shortText:
MedPoints™ system allows patients to digitize and keep medical records in any format.
In future data will be encrypted at all stages, what guarantees that only the records owner has full access to them, which is an indispensable condition for ensuring privacy and security of documents stored.
blogs.text:
MedPoints™ system allows patients to digitize and keep medical records in any format.
In future data will be encrypted at all stages, what guarantees that only the records owner has full access to them, which is an indispensable condition for ensuring privacy and security of documents stored.

Each record will be a part of a distributed ledger and cannot be altered or tampered with.
Various medical organizations can request access to the patient's medical chart. The patient can allow to access either the entire medical chart or a limited number of records. Coupled with the ability to set the time access limits for specific organizations, this tool provides each patient a wide range of functions for managing his or her digitized medical records.

The system automatically converts the uploaded files in png and jpg/jpeg formats. Converted images weigh a lot less than the source images, which positively affects the cost of digitizing and encourages patients to upload as much data from their medical records as possible.

blogs.title: Searching mechanics in MedPoints™ system
blogs.shortText: The search bar is available on all pages of the site. Searching is possible in clinics, services, doctors, pharmacies and drugs reference. Among drugs implemented an alphabetical search, thanks to which we get only drugs whose names begin with certain characters.

blogs.title: Personal account upgrade
blogs.shortText: In the current version of the MedPoints™ MVP, we have added the ability to create virtual medical cards. You can download the documents you have in jpeg, png, txt, pdf, xml and doc formats.
blogs.text:
In the current version of the MedPoints™ MVP, we have added the ability to create virtual medical cards. You can download the documents you have in jpeg, png, txt, pdf, xml and doc formats. Downloading forms the history of medical records with the ability to preview the available image files.

Duplicate files will be automatically deleted. After downloading, the files are sent to the server, in a folder accessible only to current user. Files became indexed in the database for further sorting and become available in the "Records" section.

blogs.title: Downloading documents upgrade
blogs.shortText: Added functionality for uploading documents to your personal account. To do this, click "Add record" and select a maximum of 10 files, each with a size of no more than 1MB. Available formats: doc, pdf, txt, jpg, jpeg, png, xml. The following files are sent to the server. Indexed in the database and available in the "Records" section.

blogs.title: Download documents attached to the booking
blogs.shortText: Attachment of downloadable documents to referrals to a doctor was done. To do this was created the uploads table in the database, in which the parameters of each downloaded document are placed in the following form:

blogs.title: Connection of Blockchain with MVP
blogs.shortText: Blockchain iteracts with mvp during API:
blogs.text:
Blockchain iteracts with mvp during API:

/wallets - requested when creating a new account

/blocks - request:
http://medpoints.online/rates
http://medpoints.online/explorer

/transactions - requested when creating a booking

/{userAddress}/transactions - request:
http://medpoints.online/account
http://medpoints.online/account/records
http://medpoints.online/account/edit
http://medpoints.online/account/favourites

blogs.title: Filters for uploaded medical records
blogs.shortText: Filters were made by type of documents and date. For documents attached to booking, this is the date of the appointment with the doctor, and for individual documents, this is the date they were uploaded to the server.

blogs.title: Assistance Foundation cases
blogs.shortText: The functionality of adding a specific campaign to your account has been implemented. You need to go to foundation, select open campaigns, and click list funds opposite the chosen case. After that, a request will be sent to the server with the following parameters:

blogs.title: Remove from favorites
blogs.shortText: Added the ability to remove Clinic, Doctor or Pharmacy from favorites. To do this, a request to the database is sent:

blogs.title: Demo balance
blogs.shortText: Added functionality of account demo balance. In the transaction list balance, only recharge is available. Implemented through the database.

blogs.title: Adding new localizations
blogs.shortText: We continue to expand the geography of the project by adding new language versions of the MVP.
blogs.text:
We continue to expand the geography of the project by adding new language versions of the MVP. At the moment we have connected the translation of the system into German, French and Italian.

Willkommen zurück, Bienvenue & benvenuto!

loginRequest: You need to Log In, in order to view your favourites.
confirmEmail: Thank you for registration, your email has been successfully confirmed. All alerts will be sent to this address.
terms:
By accessing and using the MedPoints™ website (our or this 'Website'), you agree to the following terms of use as they may be modified, changed, supplemented or updated from time to time (collectively, these 'terms'), as well as all applicable laws and regulations. Your access to and use of this Website constitutes your acceptance of and agreement to abide by each of the terms set forth below including our Privacy Policy which is hereby incorporated in these terms by reference. If you are using our Website on behalf of your organization, that organization accepts these terms.

These terms may be modified, changed, supplemented or updated by MedPoints™ ('medpoints.online', 'medpoints.io', 'we', 'us' or 'our') in its sole discretion at any time without advance notice. We suggest that you visit this page regularly to keep up to date with any changes. Your continued use of this Website will confirm your acceptance of these terms as modified, changed, supplemented or updated by us. If you do not agree to such revised terms you must stop using this Website and any information, links or content contained on this Website.

Use of Website

The purpose of our Website is to provide you with you some general information about the software being developed by MedPoints™. You must not breach any of the following terms or our Acceptable Use Policy set out below.

Open Source Software

We may make (but are not obligated to make) the source code for the software we develop available for download as open source software. You agree to be bound by, and comply with, any license agreement that applies to this open source software. You will not indicate that you are associated with us in connection with your use, modifications or distributions of this open source software.

When we host any software, and enable you to access and use such software through our websites including this Website, then these terms will apply to such access and use, as well as any license agreements that we may enter into with you.

Third Party Content

We may display third-party content, advertisements, links, promotions, logos and other materials on our Website (collectively, the 'Third-Party Content') for your convenience only. We do not approve of, control, endorse or sponsor any third parties or Third-Party Content, and we make no representations or warranties of any kind regarding such Third-Party Content, including, without limitation, the accuracy, validity, legality, copyright compliance, or decency of such content. Your use of or interactions with any Third-Party Content, and any third party that provides Third-Party Content, are solely between you and such third parties and we are not responsible or liable in any manner for such use or interactions. We are not responsible for any of the content on third party sites linked to our Website nor can it be assumed that we have reviewed or approved of such sites or their content, nor do we warrant that the links to these sites work or are up to date.

User Content

If you post, upload, input, provide or submit your personal data to us, including without limitation, your name, email address, IP address, cryptocurrency address, text, code or other information and materials, sign up to our mailing list or create an account on our Website (collectively, your 'User Content'), you must ensure that the User Content provided by you at that or at any other time is true, accurate, up to date and complete and that any User Content you post, upload, input, provide or submit to us or via our Website do not breach or infringe the intellectual property rights of any third party. We do not own, control or endorse any User Content that is transmitted, stored or processed via our Website or sent to us and we are not responsible or liable for any User Content. You are solely responsible and liable for all of your User Content and for your use of any interactive features, links or information or content on our Website, and you represent and warrant that (i) you own all intellectual property rights (or have obtained all necessary permissions) to provide your User Content and to grant the licenses in these terms; (ii) your User Content will not violate any agreements or confidentiality obligations; and (iii) your User Content will not violate, infringe or misappropriate any intellectual property right or other proprietary right, including the right of publicity or privacy, of any person or entity.

You are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your User Content and any of your non-public information. Furthermore, you are entirely responsible for any and all activities that occur under your account (if any). You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your User Content, account or any other breach of security. We will not be liable for any loss or damages that you may incur as a result of someone else using your User Content or account, either with or without your knowledge. However, you could be held liable for losses incurred by the MedPoints™ Parties (as defined below) or another party due to someone else using your User Content or account. You may not use anyone else's User Content or account at any time without the permission of such person or entity.

By posting, uploading, inputting, providing or submitting your User Content to us, you grant MedPoints™, its affiliates and any necessary sub-licensees a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, right and permission to use, reproduce, copy, edit, modify, translate, reformat, create derivative works from, distribute, transmit, publicly perform and publicly display your User Content and sub-license such rights to others.

You must immediately update and inform us of any changes to your User Content by updating your personal data by contacting us at support@medpoints.online or make the appropriate changes in your account on the website, so that we can communicate with you effectively and provide accurate and up to date information to you.

Although we have no obligation to screen, edit or monitor User Content, we reserve the right, and have absolute discretion, to remove, screen or edit User Content. Furthermore, if we have reason to believe that there is likely to be a breach of security, breach or misuse of our Website or if you breach any of your obligations under these terms or the Privacy Policy, we may suspend your use of this Website at any time and for any reason.

Any User Content submitted by you on this Website may be accessed for search engines around the world.

Feedback

If you decide to submit questions, comments, suggestions, ideas, original or creative materials or other information to us (collectively, 'Feedback'), you do so on your own accord and not{{localize req 'ratings.basedOn'}}any request or solicitation from us. Feedback does not include User Content. We reserve the right to use Feedback for any purpose at no charge and without compensation to you. Do not send us Feedback if you expect to be paid or want to continue to own or claim rights to your Feedback. The purpose of these terms is to avoid potential misunderstandings or disputes if MedPoints™ products, services, business ideas or business strategies might seem similar to ideas submitted to us as Feedback. If you decide to send us Feedback, you acknowledge and understand that the MedPoints™ Parties make no assurances that your Feedback will be treated as confidential or proprietary.

Aggregate Information

This information helps us to design and arrange our Web pages in a user-friendly manner and to continually improve our Website to better meet the needs of our Website users. We may share this kind of aggregate data with selected third parties to assist with these purposes. Personal data is processed by us in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

Indemnification

To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, you will indemnify, defend and hold harmless us and our respective past, present and future employees, officers, directors, contractors, consultants, equity holders, suppliers, vendors, service providers, parent companies, subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, representatives, predecessors, successors and assigns (collectively, the 'MedPoints™ Parties') from and against all claims, damages, liabilities, losses, costs and expenses (including attorneys' fees) that arise from or relate to: (i) your access to or use of our Website, products or services; (ii) your User Content; (iii) any Feedback you provide; or (iv) your violation of these Terms.

policyText:
This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their 'Personally Identifiable Information' is being used online. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our site.

What personal information do we collect from the people that visit site?

When registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, credit card information, information required for 'know your customer' and 'anti-money laundering' checks where applicable or oher details to help you with your experience.

When do we collect information?

We collect information from you when you register on our site, make a contribution, subscribe to a newsletter and in other ways if it is clearly demand by the site.

How do we use your information?

We may use the collected information in the following ways:

  • To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and offerings in which you are most interested.
  • To improve our site in order to better serve you.
  • To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests.
  • To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature.
  • To quickly process your transactions.
  • To send periodic emails regarding your contribution or our products and services.
  • To follow up with them after correspondence (live chat, email or phone inquiries)

How do we protect your information?

Our site is scanned on a regular basis for security holes and known vulnerabilities in order to make your visit to our site as safe as possible.

Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive/credit information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology. We implement a variety of security measures when you make a contribution or use site in any way to maintain the safety of your personal information. All transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers.

Do we use 'cookies'?

Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process your account. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.

We use cookies to:

  • Help remember and process your account.
  • Understand and save user's preferences for future visits.
  • Keep track of advertisements.
  • Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may also use trusted third-party services that track this information on our behalf. You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies. You do this through your browser settings. Since browser is a little different, look at your browser's Help Menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.

If users disable cookies in their browser:

If you turn cookies off, some of the features that make your site experience more efficient may not function properly.

Third-party disclosure

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information. This does not include site hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our site, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release information when it's release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

Third-party links

Occasionally, we may include or offer third-party products or services on our site. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and you will be notified of any Privacy Policy changes: On our Privacy Policy Page. Can change your personal information: By logging in to your account.

If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at support@medpoints.online and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence. In case you want us to stop collecting, using, protecting or otherwise handling your Personally Identifiable Information you can email us at support@medpoints.online and we will promptly stop. In such case you should understand and agree that you cannot longer use our site and its functionality.

Contacting Us

If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us via support@medpoints.online
privacyTerms:
Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern Medpoints™ relationship with you in relation to this website. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website.


The term 'Medpoints™' or 'us' or 'we' refers to the owner of the website.

This website is not collecting personal data, but we use third party tools that might do so. Please check their privacy policies for further information: Googla Analytics, Google AdSense, Google Mail, Facebook, Godaddy hosting.


The use of this website is subject to the following terms of use:

  • The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice.

  • This website uses Google Analytics to monitor browsing preferences. If you do allow this to be used, some personal information may be stored by us.

  • We use cookies to collect anonymous visitor statistics through Google Analytics, to show personalized ads with Google AdSense, to save your editor settings and to detect if this is the first time you're visiting the site. Please read third party privacy policies for more details: Google Analytics, Google AdSense.

  • We show ads and might place randomly a link to the end of the cleaned documents.

  • Neither we nor any third parties provide any warranty or guarantee as to the accuracy, timeliness, performance, completeness or suitability of the information and materials found or offered on this website for any particular purpose. You acknowledge that such information and materials may contain inaccuracies or errors and we expressly exclude liability for any such inaccuracies or errors to the fullest extent permitted by law.

  • Your use of any information or materials on this website is entirely at your own risk, for which we shall not be liable. It shall be your own responsibility to ensure that any products, services or information available through this website meet your specific requirements.

  • This website contains material which is owned by or licensed to us. This material includes, but is not limited to, the cleaning script, the design, layout, look, appearance and graphics. Reproduction is prohibited other than in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions.

  • All trademarks reproduced in this website which are not the property of, or licensed to, the operator are acknowledged on the website.

  • Unauthorised use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages and/or be a criminal offence.

  • From time to time this website may also include links to other websites. These links are provided for your convenience to provide further information. They do not signify that we endorse the website(s). We have no responsibility for the content of the linked website(s).

  • Your use of this website and any dispute arising out of such use of the website is subject to the laws of England, Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales.
